## TaskGroupConfig interface

task group configuration

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TaskGroupConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fastFail?](./teamsfx-api.taskgroupconfig.fastfail.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> whether to terminate all tasks if some task is failed or canceled |
|  [sequential?](./teamsfx-api.taskgroupconfig.sequential.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> if true, the tasks in the group are running in parallel if false, the tasks are running in sequence. |
